transArray.content: It's very good. I'll stay here again next time. I saw that the front desk of 520 prepared roses today, which was very thoughtful.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement and support. The welcome gifts carefully prepared by the hotel for you carry our most sincere greetings and expectations for you. We are committed to providing every guest with meticulous, thoughtful, warm and considerate services. We strive to make every guest happy to become a repeat customer. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel are looking forward to your next stay. Thank you! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
